text: Ara ya-kichu ache mahakasamandale ebam ya-kichu prthibite se-saba'i allah‌ra. Ara amara niscaya'i nirdesa diyachilama tomadera age yadera kitaba deya hayechila tadera ebam tomadera'o yena tomara allah‌ke bhaya-srad'dha karabe. Kintu yadi tomara abisbasa posana karo tabe nihsandeha allah‌ra'i ya-kichu ache mahakasamandale o ya-kichu prthibite. Ara allah hacchena mahadhanabana, parama prasansita.
